name: library_license_checker
description: Analyzes a Python file, extracts imported libraries, checks their licenses, and rates legal risk.

functions.name: check_licenses
functions.description: Returns license details and risk ratings for imported libraries in a Python file.

arguments.file_path: Path to the Python file to analyze.
arguments.export: Optional boolean to export the results as an Excel file.
arguments.output_path: Optional path to the Excel file to write (default: license_report.xlsx).
